item.title: Breaking: Brazil President Proposes To Ditch US Dollar For Another Currency | Coingape
item.dc:creator: Coingape Staff
item.description:
In the face of mounting challenges such as soaring debt, interest rate hikes, inflation, and brewing uncertainty in the financial markets, the United States is witnessing a decline in the prominence of its once-mighty dollar. As the US struggles to regain stability, the BRICS nations—Brazil, Russia, India, China, and South Africa—have been actively seeking alternatives

The post Breaking: Brazil President Proposes To Ditch US Dollar For Another Currency appeared first on CoinGape.

item.description:

item.title: Binance Appoints New Head For Regional Markets Amid Regulatory Scrutiny | Coingape
item.dc:creator: Jai Pratap
item.description:
The world’s largest crypto exchange by trading volume, Binance, has appointed Richard Teng to oversee its all regional markets outside the United States. Binance has been facing regulatory scrutiny from the US regulators for some time now. Richard Teng, who joined Binance as CEO of Singapore in August 2021, revealed his new position on LinkedIn.

The post Binance Appoints New Head For Regional Markets Amid Regulatory Scrutiny appeared first on CoinGape.
